modName: Speechcraft Max and All Perks Cheat
summary: Simple bat file that sets you speech crafting to 100 and adds all perks.
descriptionHtml:
To use simply place in your skyrim root folder. After file is in folder, hit the ~ key and type bat speech. 

Please don\'t tell me how much cheating messes up the design of the game and can ruin gameplay (make it to easy),  just don\'t use cheats if you feel that way. 

I will keep, player.setav carryweight 3000, anytime I choose to.
author: Vertog
